file_content.text: Only good sep sniper is a dead one.
Good shooting. Report to Commander Vray up at the refugee camp, he'll want to hear the good news.
Bury those sniper scumbags.
How do. Private Wesner, Thirty-first Recon out of Fort Garnik.
Watch your head out there. Separatists deployed snipers in the area last week. Good snipers.
Plenty of casualties between here and Fort Garnik. Those seps will shoot at anything.
Who are their targets?
Anything?
Soldiers. Vehicles. Civilians--especially the refugees, from all the war-torn settlements.
I recommend an air strike. Set the place on fire.
So burn them out.
Not an option. Too many civilians in the area--the refugees, from all the war-torn settlements.
If you're still alive, I'll be fine.
Out of my way, idiot.
The Republic doesn't train idiots. I got a good head and I plan to keep it.
Sniper targets aren't so lucky. Civilians in particular--the refugees, from all the war-torn settlements.
They pass through on their way to the refugee camp outside Fort Garnik. Boom. Sniper bait.
Maybe I can help.
We'll take any gun we can get.
Most despicable thing I've ever heard.
That's horrible!
Yes, ma'am. All the way despicable, ma'am.
Yes, sir. One hundred percent despicable, sir.
And I care why?
This grunt likes to know when innocent people are dying nearby. Thought you might like to know, too.
Fort Garnik wants those snipers retired ASAP. Commander Vray even offered a week's pay to anyone who makes it happen.
I'll kill the scum for free.
This one's on me.
I'm in.
It'll be a pleasure to watch, ma'am.
Damn glad to hear it, sir.
For that kind of money, I will absolutely, definitely... think about it.
Maybe.
Sounds fair to me, ma'am.
Sounds fair to me, sir.
If you take out the snipers, report to Commander Vray at the refugee camp outside Fort Garnik.
Good hunting.
Careful. Separatist snipers in the area. Poke your head up in the wrong place--and boom.
